sentences.en: A beaver looking for a building site is very choosy.
sentences.cn: 河狸寻找造窝的场所时是很挑剔的.

sentences.en: A hungry person is not choosy about his food.
But once a basic need has been covered customers become more choosy.
sentences.cn: 但是一旦基本需求被满足之后,消费者会变得更加挑剔.

sentences.en: By this time of life, be choosy.
sentences.cn: 已经到了这个时候, 就更不要将就了.

sentences.en: Choosy mothers choose Jif for their kids.
sentences.cn: 挑剔的妈妈,专为孩子挑“吉福”.

sentences.en: Don't be so choosy. Take what you're given.
sentences.cn: 别嘴尖了, 给你什么你就吃什么.

sentences.en: He is never choosy about his job.
sentences.cn: 他对工作从不挑三拣四.

sentences.en: He is too choosy to succeed.
sentences.cn: 他这个人高不成,低不就,不会成就大事业.

sentences.en: Hung - chien said with a laugh, " Who told you to be so choosy?
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 笑道: “ 谁教你眼光那样高的.

sentences.en: I'm very choosy about my clothes.
sentences.cn: 我对自己的衣着很讲究。

sentences.en: Jean's very choosy about what she eats.
Miss Yates if very choosy about who she goes out with.
sentences.cn: 耶茨小姐在和谁一起出去玩的问题上很挑剔.

sentences.en: She's very choosy about who she goes out with.
sentences.cn: 她愿意和谁幽会不愿意和谁幽会是很挑剔的.

sentences.en: Skiers should be particularly choosy about the insurance policy they buy.
sentences.cn: 滑雪者在选择购买保险的问题上应该尤其慎重。

trans.tran_en: someone who is choosy will only accept things that they like a lot or they consider to be very good
